oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Kate Shute in mourning
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Cabinet card of Kate Shute, dressed in black. Written on the back of the card is "Kate Shute in mourning over death of brother."

Kate Carney Shute (1864-1925) was the fourth daughter of William D. and Lavinia Shute. She married William Croft (1860-1938) of Charleston, South Carolina, at Grassmere in 1888. Kate and William had two daughters, Margaret (1889-1974) and Elise (1894-1985).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Schleier, T. M. (Theodore M.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Women--Tennessee
Mourning clothing & dress; Portraits; Portrait photographs; Cabinet photographs
